# MarketplaceV3DirectListings.currencyPriceForListing() method

Check price per token for an approved currency

## Example

```javascript
const listingId = 0;
const currencyContractAddress = "0x1234";
const price = await contract.directListings.currencyPriceForListing(
  listingId,
  currencyContractAddress,
);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
currencyPriceForListing(listingId: BigNumberish, currencyContractAddress: string): Promise<BigNumberish>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter               | Type         | Description               |
| ----------------------- | ------------ | ------------------------- |
| listingId               | BigNumberish | the listing id            |
| currencyContractAddress | string       | currency contract address |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;BigNumberish&gt;
